title: Check Compliance with Water Quality Regulations
description: A farmer needs to ensure their nutrient management plan complies with local water quality regulations to prevent runoff.

tasks.description: Retrieve the farmer's current nutrient management plan, including planned fertilizer application rates and timing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the details of the plan.

tasks.description: Retrieve the specific water quality regulations for the farm's watershed, focusing on phosphorus and nitrogen limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the relevant government regulations.

tasks.description: Compare the farmer's plan against the regulations and flag any potential non-compliance issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the planned fall phosphorus application is not permitted under the regulations.

tasks.description: Suggest modifications to the plan to ensure compliance, such as moving the phosphorus application to the spring.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an actionable recommendation to fix the compliance issue.
